sense.def:
Clinical
se nanaša na neposredno zdravljenje pacientov v nasprotju s teoretskimi raziskavami;

seg.quote: Doctors are hoping to start clinical tests next month.
On examination she looked well and was not clinically anaemic.
She adopted an icy, impersonal, clinical attitude.

sense.def:
Soba ali stavba, ki je
clinical
, je zelo preprosta ali preveč pospravljena in čista, tako da ljudem v njej ni prijetno.
